price: Wannan wani yanki ne mai kũtsawa tãre da ku, bãbu marãba a gare su, lalle sũ, mãsu shiga Wutã ne.
arabic: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
